thread.title: Jeff Daniels grounded by harsh reality check with 'The Martian' - WESH-TV
thread.title_full: Jeff Daniels grounded by harsh reality check with 'The Martian' - WESH-TV - Discussion on Topix

author: Source: WESH-TV
title: Jeff Daniels grounded by harsh reality check with 'The Martian' - WESH-TV
text:
Given his diverse resume over the past 35 years in the film and TV business, it shouldn't come as a big surprise that within the past couple of years, acclaimed actor Jeff Daniels has swung so widely across the character spectrum. After all, how many actors can you see taking on a screwball comedy like "Dumb and Dumber To," the TV drama "The Newsroom" and new sci-fi action adventure "The Martian" in one-fell swoop? "It's by choice.
 WESH-TV.
